nodes.name: Transcription Webhook
nodes.notes: Receives audio transcription requests. Expects: { audio: base64, language, mimeType? }

nodes.name: Prepare Transcription
nodes.notes: Maps language codes to names and prepares Gemini API request with inline audio data

nodes.name: Gemini Transcription
nodes.notes: Calls Gemini 2.5 Flash with audio for transcription. Uses GEMINI_API_KEY environment variable.

nodes.name: Parse Response
nodes.notes: Extracts transcribed text from Gemini response
